title: How to Make Quick and Easy Creamy Chicken Pasta Sauce

text: Put on the kettle.  Get a heavy based pan and heat with olive oil.  Add finely cut spring onions and fry.  Pour hot water in a larger pan and bring to the boil. Add salt and olive oil. Add the mushrooms and shredded chicken to your spring onions.  Add the fresh pasta to boiling water. This will cook for 5 minutes on average, but it might differ so check the packet. Add the white wine to your onions, mushrooms and chicken.  Lower the heat on the pan and add the crème fraiche. This will melt down into a sauce. Add salt, pepper and other herbs. Let that simmer.  Put the pasta through a colander over the sink when done.  Put in a bowl and add olive oil and pepper. Mix so it coats the pasta evenly. Pour the sauce on top of the pasta when ready.
